title: Not receiving level up rewards
body: I leveled up on two accounts twice and didnâ€™t receive rewards it shows the level up capsule saying I got it but once I get into the loot page its not there.

replies.body: Hey, if this is still an issue reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with details on these two accounts.  We'd like to take a look at each individually and offer them if we do find that they're missing.  See you there!
